website_summaries.verdict: A true show piece of a model car meant for model builders wanting a little bit of Hollywood magic to display.
pros: Unique Dodge Charger model is based off of the Fast and Furious franchise
Panels are detailed and blank for custom paint jobs and decals
Tires and chrome parts add a unique look to the finished model
cons: The build quality of the car depends on the specific kit as some come with incomplete parts

customer_reviews.title: Not HAPPY not HAPPY at all (disappointed)
customer_reviews.text: Spend two to three weeks putting this model together taking my time but did not matter because there several things that I had to adjust or drill which I was able to let pass but even after frame fit every where else except the front no matter how many times I tried to re adjust to make things fit it was “no go” money wasted which it does bother me about the money but what really bothers me is the time I put into it. the 2 to 3 weeks priming Gluing fixing adjusting and almost at the end the (#$&%-+()#@#$) frame does fit correctly so I was not able to even finish #@$&)(%3*()-:) thing...
customer_reviews.author: Michael l

customer_reviews.title: Good model
customer_reviews.text: Good model. I had fun building it. That company needs to work on its wheels though. I always have problems with them not staying on.
customer_reviews.author: R. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Detailed kit
customer_reviews.text: Very detailed kit ,skill 5 ofc. Went together well seen a review that said it didnt go tougher well. Hmm he needs to buy a skill 1 snap kit all was well here. Great price. Shipping sux Amazon fualt OFC. Was delayed for two days due driver he should of called.
customer_reviews.author: james Jones

customer_reviews.title: It’s not bad
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t come with the paint or glue like the box says it does
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: The box was a bit dented when we received it. Otherwise, it was the perfect gift for my car-loving youngster.
customer_reviews.author: Niesha Richardson

customer_reviews.title: What's better than the ultimate muscle car.
customer_reviews.text: Have not built it yet, but already my favorite of my collection of iconic movie and TV cars.
customer_reviews.author: Tog

customer_reviews.title: The real deal
customer_reviews.text: Other than the price, was exactly what I was looking for. My oldest son is going to be tickled when he gets it. Did arrive very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed on this purchase. It comes with zero paint on the actual item. No where in the description did it say this.
customer_reviews.author: jaime locklear

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: The box came a bit misshapen. I purchased as a gift for my husband so fingers crossed everything is in top shape inside of the box
customer_reviews.author: Whovianmom

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking model .  Level five
customer_reviews.text: Looks Sweet . Does take a bit of time to put together .
customer_reviews.author: Rita McLain

customer_reviews.title: jesus loves u
customer_reviews.text: loved seeing the look on my cousins face as he received it for his birthday
customer_reviews.author: john Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son in law loves models and he said this one was a thrill to build and paint.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham Williams

customer_reviews.title: Out of 7 items only 2 arrived
customer_reviews.text: As far as the model kit, I think it is fine, but I ordered 7 items on Dec. 7 and only 2 have arrived--VERY disappointed with Amazon delivery!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Chaney

customer_reviews.title: It was decent
customer_reviews.text: I liked the car and the build but it came missing the front grill. That pretty much makes the whole car.
customer_reviews.author: Trent M.

customer_reviews.title: Wow Revell You Got One Almost Right.
customer_reviews.text: Now I was impressed with this one however the grill was all wrong the lights are always showing in each clip of the movie. I had to drill into the piece and redo the grill which in turn damaged the grills chrome. Meaning I had to dull it and paint the booboo's. Other than that it's perfect dead match. The interior will need some work but that's easy to do. That is if you want the replica of the car as close as you can get it.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift. This person loves fast & furious and loves doing model cars so I feel it will be a huge hit
customer_reviews.author: Jody Bedard

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t built it yet, but looks fantastic. So much detail. Definitely for experienced model builders
customer_reviews.author: Patmac033

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Missing two sections of parts. The intake and blower and the rims.
customer_reviews.author: idk man

product_meta.title: Revell Fast & Furious Dominic's 1970 Dodge Charger Plastic Model Kit
feature_bullets: Construct your own fast & Furious car with this challenging 122-piece model kit
Kit features detailed blown Hemi engine, raiser rear suspension and drag slicks, roll bar, and fire extinguisher
Kit is molded in white, transparent red, and clear with chrome parts and soft black tires, paint and glue sold separately
This kit is recommended for ages 14 years and up

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars311 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
